Title: EClient
Description: This was a project started during the third year of college in a networking class. The pop3 client was a project which completed for class, but lacks some of the finer coding styles or implementation. This email client should be compliant with newer technology and adaptable.

Project Description
This was a project started during the third year of college in a networking class. The pop3 client was a project which completed for class, but lacks some of the finer coding styles or implementation. This email client should be compliant with newer technology and adaptable.
